meaningMnemonic: The meaning of this noun is the same as the kanji, <vocabulary>lamp</vocabulary>. Can also mean <vocabulary>light</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>torch</vocabulary> as well, depending on where you herald from.
readingMnemonic: The reading is like that of 明るい, which means "bright." At least the あか part is the same. What is a <vocabulary>lamp</vocabulary> if not <reading>明</reading>るい (あか)? Another way to think of it is "what is a bright color?" The color <reading>赤</reading> (あか) is a bright color and would make a sexy lamp.
